product_name: REI Tech Beast Wheeled Duffel - 22" - Special Buy
long_description: The REI Tech Beast Wheeled Duffel 22" is built for the short haul and keeps you organized and your travel simplified. It fits in most overhead bins and suits adventures that require tough luggage.
